website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Jeans is a good deal in many distinguishable ways. For one, it has this classically neat silhouette that adds sophistication. It also has this snug fit that makes a lot of wearer feel very comfortable.If the wearer is one to experiment with outfits, there are a lot of colorways to choose from. But one actually need not choose; at only less than $90, an average buyer can easily afford to buy more than a pair of Adidas Jeans.
pros: An overwhelming majority of those who took time to write reviews talked about how well crafted the Adidas Jeans is
Many of the purchasers enthusiastically shared that this model is among the most comfortable shoes that they have ever worn
The Adidas Jeans has the silhouette of a true classic
Several reviewers were happy with how stylish these shoes are, adding that they get heartwarming compliments whenever they go out wearing them
There are many attractive colorways to experiment with
Many of those who already own a pair are actually considering buying more pairs, this time in different hues
A large number of wearers are willing to recommend this model to their friends and acquaintances
There were older reviewers who said that the Adidas Jeans is actually better than the shoe that it is based on when it comes to fit and comfort
Many loved the flexibility of this model, saying that it easily goes well with shorts, jeans, and even sweatpants
A pair of Adidas Jeans shoes won’t put a big gash on one’s pocket
A lot of those who left reviews said that their Adidas Jeans shoes fit their feet very well, and some of them even claimed to have wider-than-normal feet
cons: Some reviewers are turned a bit off by the orangeness of the gum sole
Some noted that the colors come off as either more neon or brighter than what is expected based on the photos that were posted online

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and nice colour shoes
customer_reviews.text: I chose to buy size 11 for him even though he is usually 10.5 (he always wears Adidas Samba, blue suede, “Donny Darko shoes”), I wanted to get him something a bit different but also very similar to his favourite shoes. I had a premonition feeling that these were a likely to be slightly smaller than the original Sambas and seems that I was correct as they fit very well at half a size bigger. They are very nice shoes and are presented nicely packed. Delivery was also prompt. A*
customer_reviews.author: Xzuku

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Got the carbon grey trainers, which on the picture shown are dark grey with light grey stripes, which makes them cool. However, item received had white stripes which makes the whole product look cheap and not worth £75.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Shakeel

customer_reviews.title: Could not get these trainers for love nor money anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Could not get these trainers for love nor money anywhere. And I mean anywhere! Tried every sports shop in Newcastle and the metro Center. So purchased them from this seller instead, I’m glad I did, they are a perfect fit, came in an Adidas box as well and well wrapped up. I took a gamble on this seller and went for them. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dd

customer_reviews.title: Genuine adidas originals
customer_reviews.text: Delivered the following day. Lot cheaper than high street sport s shops. Top quality adidas originals. Size 10 is slightly bigger though than other size 10 adidas trainers I have.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Addidas jeans trainers
customer_reviews.text: Look great as expected for a timeless classic. Maybe should of got a half size bigger as some have mentioned as they are a narrow fit for a chubby guy life me as fat also gets affected by gravity!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: A rare colour in a hard to get size
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely pair of genuine Adidas trainers from a German seller. The size of UK 13 is difficult or almost impossible to find on the UK High Street so this is a real blessing to find it on Amazon. I took off one star as the trainers arrived looking a little dusty around the front toe which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Mushtaque Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for our son who lives in Spain. He thinks they’re great after only buying cheap knock-offs himself. I think they’re substantially less expensive in the U.K. than in Spain. I expect I’ll be repeating the purchase regularly now.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Bray

customer_reviews.title: look great
customer_reviews.text: haven't worn them yet, but look great ,retro style, well made fit true,came quick prime, no complaints, prefer the look of these over samba suede and beckenbaur,pluss the samba suede do not last long ,the suede goes before their is any were on the heels/soles.
customer_reviews.author: C W.

customer_reviews.title: Different size trainers delivered and not one right size as ordered
customer_reviews.text: Trainers arrived today, good postage. But to my disbelief the box said 10uk ✅ Opened box starts to try on - left foot size 9 ! Right foot size 9.5 ! Well if your going to get it wrong suppose this is the way to do it. Very disappointed as love these trainers so got the task of return and waiting for refund then gotta re order !!! Me socks will be wearing out quick thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ckw

customer_reviews.title: Icon stylish trainers but something more important.....
customer_reviews.text: This trainers are classic designs from the Adidas. I purchased the off white style. But the most important thing with any trainer, shoe or boot is the fit.These fit perfect and so importantly are very, very, comfortable. We packaged and delivered prompty. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers would buy in other colours if available. Very comfortable, classic design.
customer_reviews.author: C. I. L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery through Prime. The usual great quality from Adidas. Excellent service as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Order the size you are
customer_reviews.text: Lots of comments saying you should order a size slightly higher than your normal size. I am size 11 UK and that’s what I ordered. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. Great trainers and arrived the next day with prime. I would recommend just ordering the size you are.
customer_reviews.author: Gannicus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy trainers like the half sizes ideal for me when walking the dog
customer_reviews.author: chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Received my shoes a couple of days ago. Excellent pair, comfy and nice looking. I rarely have shoes that fit as expected but these really do.
customer_reviews.author: Zaro

customer_reviews.title: Iconic Adidas.
customer_reviews.text: Iconic trainers look great with a stylish pair of jeans. And comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: michael kerin

customer_reviews.title: Always go a half size up with Adidas. They’ve never got that sorted.
customer_reviews.text: Liked them as soon as they came out the box. Too old to use them for anything other than casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes, I ordered a size 9.5 as that is the size of my current Adidas but I had to return as they were way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: P. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Classic Trainers - Magic
customer_reviews.text: Great classic trainer, shame other colours in my size seem to be discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. R. Jeanes

customer_reviews.title: Quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Trainers arrived before the actual due date. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. The sizing said true to size and it was. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colour received
customer_reviews.text: I ordered they grey with red stripe which was the colour shown on the picture in description but the trainers I received were grey with blue stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Jeans trainers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant great quality as you would expect from Adidas
customer_reviews.author: Dean Cooke

customer_reviews.title: first class
customer_reviews.text: just what you’d expect from adidas, great fit and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: George thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful trainers 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality adidas trainers excellent delivery service no damage nuff said
customer_reviews.author: patrick martin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy,I'd recommend getting some
customer_reviews.text: Well made,very comfy,just what I expected,they're like wearing slippers,I'm currently looking at another pair,I'd recommend getting some
customer_reviews.author: Ali thomas

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and feel great !
customer_reviews.text: I love Adidas trainers and these are as expected ! They fit perfect and the shoes are very comfortable to wear !
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: great looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic and generally well made although the insole wasn't stuck down properly but after walking around in them for a bit it had stuck down.
customer_reviews.author: Callum scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Colour not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Trainers are fine, but did not get the colour I thought I was getting. I suspect it is the photo that is misleading. I would not have bought the colour combination I got, but that's life!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of trainers at a good price, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Brown

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a present, he has had them on several times. Fits as they should comfortably. No concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie Davey

customer_reviews.title: ... I had them within 48 hours so still a good, prompt service
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery although I was offered to pay an extra £5 to get them the next day I had them within 48 hours so still a good, prompt service. Trainers are an excellent fit and look good. Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, nice and comfortable. Delivered next day in good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: I G Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers my husband loves them fast delivery good service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They are better than I thought & comfortable too, size is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. Seem perfect, maybe a bit tight fitting, but that might be because they are new and need to loosen up a bit
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trainers and quality as to be expected from Adidas couldn't be happier with them and delivery was sooner than thought! 10/10 service
customer_reviews.author: Xclipz

customer_reviews.title: super shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a passion for adidas trainers and had to have these. The colour is fantastic, very vibrant. As usual the fit and quality is brill.
customer_reviews.author: simplesimon

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable after an hour
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers but after about an hour my heels were killing me, under the sponge insole is a hard sort of honeycomb which is really uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: william cartwright

customer_reviews.title: There are cheaper products but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great product and looks good with jeans or shorts. Just what I expected for an Adidas product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hugely uncomfortable, inner soles appear to have built in rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like the trainers and the delivery was great but I am gobsmacked that the sizing is so far out
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8 and the trainers are far to small 7 at the biggest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Trainer's are excellent quality. However never come in an original Adidas box, why? Sorry but won't be buying trainers from this site again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Roby

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product. Everything as expected. Delivered faster than expected. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Juwaheer

customer_reviews.title: As described...
customer_reviews.text: Adidas trainers and my favourite style. All good and genuine from this seller. Quick delivery, all as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: There are nice but a bit too big for my size
customer_reviews.text: I put on mine today for the first time, they look great but hurting my right leg when I walk. I think they are not sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Moise

customer_reviews.title: My experience with online shopping.
customer_reviews.text: My trainers fit perfectly and I'm very happy with my purchase. I look forward to shopping more on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: HUDDERSFIELD YOUNG CASUAL

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colour received.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ones with red stripes but received blue stripes, not a big deal but wasn’t what i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Beware. These are smaller sizes than you might think
customer_reviews.text: I like these trainers but although they claim to be UK size 11, they are not. They are too small. I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Size? Look?
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t look like the photo. Laces are very close together. Tongue isn’t long as shown. Hardly protruding the top.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Dont pay for quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great just what I ordered, paid extra for quick delivery but they took ages.
customer_reviews.author: clive b.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , good product and good service from the seller. Just grey color it's more clear than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe kempeneers

customer_reviews.title: The availability
customer_reviews.text: For casual use , loving the retro look , had a pair when I was 18 now I'm 54 brings back memories
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: small fit
customer_reviews.text: bit small for a size 8 could have done with a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: belfast will

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers - quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers - cheaper then in the shop and delivery was great too def will order again
customer_reviews.author: TobiK

customer_reviews.title: Great all round service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit really comfy and arrived 2 days before the date expected 👍
customer_reviews.author: Philip Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Never been used Adidas before. I'm happy with Jean's model, fit well and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Atanasov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and quality as you would expect from Adidas. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Mr Colin O

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son wanted for xmas. One happy customer. Good quality and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne
